result.name: TRUST PIZZA & BURGERS (Evromisto)

reviews.text: First pizza that seems to me fair with price and good with quality and taste. I tried the Parma pizza, where all ingredients were fresh, the crust was soft and fluffy , a touch of parmigiano cheese was added, all together made a perfect pizza. Medium size has 8 slices.

I absolutely love this place for the delicious food! Solyanochka is actually my favorite here! And what delicious sushi! I am delighted! And for the first time I see undiluted soy sauce! Coffee - soft, not overcooked beans) in general - I really like leaving money here üòÇ

I made an order today, they got to work quickly, they called back after just 3 minutes, clarified everything, I am a new customer, this pizzeria offers a 40% discount on pizza, but when talking to the administrator, he did not even inform me about it until I went to him myself I asked if this promotion is still valid, because I saw on their website that there is such a thing, after that they gave me a discount, I would buy from them even without a discount, but if this promotion is valid, then they should inform about it, well, that's it . The pizza and all other food was brought quickly by uklon taxi at their expense, but unfortunately it was all already cold, had to be heated in the microwave and the taste was already a little not what it should be, because the food was not in a special bag, which could have kept warm, she was just lying in the car, the courier called me, said that he had already arrived and was waiting for me to go pick up the order as soon as possible, I quote: "Let anyone pick it up, I just want it to be faster", also in such a tone, that I got the impression that he is in a big hurry somewhere and wants to deliver this order as soon as possible, I would go out and pick it up as soon as possible anyway, so as not to delay the courier, because I understand everything, I don't want to make someone wait for me.
Everything was tasty, I liked it in principle, but the Carbonara pasta was, in my opinion, spicy, the Meat pizza was great, a lot of meat, but very few tomatoes, the burger top, it's a shame that it didn't come with any sauce, because there were fries , it's not the same without him.
Write the terms of delivery on your website, where you can deliver, so that I understand, otherwise I searched and could not find this information anywhere, I had to ask the administration. Maybe someday I will order here again, who knows.

Ordering with delivery and payment through the site is convenient, but the impression of the proposed tip during the first order, frankly, is so-so, although there is an option to refuse to leave a tip. In my personal opinion, it should be offered to regular customers, but definitely not on the first order. A call with clarification and confirmation of the order within three minutes, informed about the promotion with a gift - politely, of course, and gifts - always nice.
Delivery to the door in 50 minutes - super. The courier is polite and tidy. Box bag with brand logo, clean, brand new. Everything is well packed, hot. Delivery - excellent!
From the outside, the pizza looks gorgeous, to be honest - I haven't seen better, it's a masterpiece, a work of art! No irony! The dough is thin, tasty, the filling is sufficient, distributed evenly over the entire surface. Next is a purely subjective opinion, because it's a taste. Unfortunately, my family was a little disappointed, maybe pizzaiola fell in love üôÇ, after all, spring has finally come, maybe some of the cheeses are salty, because all three pizzas (and I emphasize here - to our taste) seemed excessively salted to us, and this is definitely not dough, the dough is great! If you hesitate to order or not - feel free to order, try! For example, it was a new taste of cheese pizza for me, because I order it all the time. But I would remove the salt from the pizziola for nowüôÇüíôüíõüëç

I've been tasting new products here for the second day already))
Yesterday there was an unusual but very tasty Tom Yum pizza.
And today again a novelty - Ramen with seafood. There are a lot of them and it's satisfying.
Tomorrow I will come again for ramen with chicken.

And pleasant and cheerful employees decorate this institution with the "icing on the cake"‚ò∫Ô∏è
